Is Mayer-Rokitansky-Kster-Hauser syndrome inherited ?,"Most cases of MRKH syndrome occur in people with no history of the disorder in their family.  Less often, MRKH syndrome is passed through generations in families. Its inheritance pattern is usually unclear because the signs and symptoms of the
